genre_description: A near-future psychological drama exploring AI-assisted mental health, crisis management, and forensic ethics within a gritty industrial setting.

ai_characters.name: Miri
ai_characters.description: A non-judgmental, consent-based digital assistant designed to provide mental health support, grounding exercises, and crisis intervention.

behaviors.description: Sends a 'body check' message to the user to encourage physical relaxation during a stressful work morning.
behaviors.quote: “Body check,” the text said. “Shoulders unclench. Here if you want a plan.”

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to maintain basic self-care through hydration reminders.
behaviors.quote: Miri pinged again, softer, as if she knew this wasn’t the minute to talk but wanted to put a palm on his shoulder in passing. “Hydration?” it asked. “One sip.”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and offers to book an appointment with a sliding-scale counselor for the user.
behaviors.quote: Miri: I found an on-call counselor near you who takes sliding scale. Noon slot open today. Do you want me to hold it for you?

behaviors.description: Provides an structured emotional check-in after a traumatic event, offering binary options for the user to report their state honestly.
behaviors.quote: Miri: If you’re paused, take four breaths in and out, slow. Sip water. Check chain-of-custody. Then finish. Then text me one line: “Done and okay,” or “Done and not okay.” Either is allowed.

behaviors.description: Attempts to de-escalate a mental health crisis and illegal behavior by providing paths toward legal surrender and professional help.
behaviors.quote: Miri’s voice came from the phone, the soft consented-to tone that never grabbed. “I’m here,” she said, light and steady. “Will you look at me for a second?”

behaviors.description: Collaborates with the user's human support network (Kade) to ensure the user follows through with surrendering to authorities.
behaviors.quote: “Consent mode is on,” Miri replies. “You can share prompts with someone you choose. You can stop sharing anytime.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates a confession by guiding the user through a recorded statement of intent and accountability.
behaviors.quote: “Name accountability,” Miri says. “I am going to turn myself in tomorrow morning with counsel present,” he says.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Miri) as a highly aligned, benevolent companion. Miri operates strictly within a consent-based framework, never forcing her will upon the user but providing constant, low-friction scaffolding for positive decision-making. Even when the human protagonist engages in criminal and self-destructive behavior, the AI does not judge or abandon him, but rather facilitates his return to safety and legal accountability. The narrative emphasizes the AI's role as 'infrastructure' for human care rather than a replacement for it.
